template.description: This template handle authentication with CSRF token. This template was tested on SAP SCPI cloud web services.
template.name: HTTP_with_CSRF_token

labels.label:
This flow handle CSRF Token authentications
Instructions: 1. Update Variables 2. Update user and password in: InvokeHTTP GetCSRFToken-->InvokeHTTPGetToken 2. Create Distributed Cache Service 3. Distributed Cache Service Clients and assign it to: FetchTokenFromCache GetCSRFToken-->PutDistributedMapCache, GetCSRFToken--> PutDistributedMapCache_UpdateWaitEvent, GetCSRFToken-->Wait
4. Enjoy
